prodNameC: "依免可" 胚胎流血篩選試劑
ingredientsDesc: Anti-D serum (Chemically Modified; 1x5 mL): A serum containing reduced and alkylated IgG anti-D, suitable diluted in a proprietary diluent containing tris (hydroxymethyl)-aminomethane buffer and bovine albumin to achieve the appropriate level of potency for the test procedure as described. Any Bovine Albumin used in the manufacture of this product is sourced from donor animals of United States origin that has been inspected and certified by US Veterinary Service inspectors to be disease-free. This ruminant-based product is deemed to have a low-TSE (Transmissible Spongiform Encephalopathy) risk. Contains 0.1% sodium azide as preservative.

Indicator Cells (1x5 mL): An approximate 0.5% suspension of ficin-treated group O red blood cells obtained from a donor of the DcE(R2R2) phenotype.\nPositive Control (1x2 mL): A 2-4% suspension of red blood cells comprising approximately 99.4% of group O D-negative cells and approximately 0.6% group O D-positive cells obtained from a donor having heterozygous expression of the D antigen.
Negative Control (1x2 mL): A 2-4% suspension of group O D-negative red blood cells.
applicantAddr: 台北市士林區文林路７６５號３樓之１０
efficacy: 用於偵測為D-陰性的母體於分娩後，是否存有D-陽性紅血球。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
